channel.title: Zenith Master Cape issue
channel.description: I am pretty sure this is both server and client sided. when i go to customize the cape and choose a color it glows at the bottom. but if I just wear it the cape does not glow. I have seen servers with this cape working. any suggestions how to fix this? (it has to be the right model; just something isn't telling it to refresh when you wear it.
